heroIntro:
This sophisticated 3-bedroom villa represents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers seeking premium property in the heart of Costa Blanca's most prestigious golfing community. Reference N9364 embodies the pinnacle of contemporary living, offering 306 square metres of meticulously designed space set upon a generous 462-square-metre plot within the exclusive La Finca Golf estate in Algorfa.

At €779,000, this property delivers outstanding value—commanding a price per square metre of €2,546, representing 50% less than comparable properties in crowded coastal towns. This premium specification villa combines architectural excellence with strategic location, appealing to those who understand that true luxury means selective investment rather than premium coastal premiums. The Algorfa market has demonstrated robust growth of +12% year-on-year, positioning this acquisition as both a lifestyle choice and a prudent financial decision.

For investors and residents alike, this villa offers the sophisticated European living experience that luxury buyers seek: exclusive community amenities, world-class golfing facilities, and proximity to essential services, all without the inflated prices of over-developed coastal areas.
areaSection: Algorfa is a charming inland municipality in southern Alicante, strategically positioned between the coast and inland Vega Baja region. This thriving settlement of approximately 6,000 residents maintains an authentic Mediterranean character while embracing modern infrastructure. The area enjoys a pleasant year-round climate with over 300 days of sunshine, making it ideal for those seeking outdoor recreation without the tourist congestion of beachside alternatives. Algorfa has undergone thoughtful development in recent years, establishing itself as a hub for the international golfing community. The municipality's elevation and layout create natural protection from extreme weather while offering panoramic countryside views. Local governance prioritizes environmental preservation, maintaining green spaces and respecting traditional village aesthetics. The genuine Spanish atmosphere—with weekly markets, family-run restaurants, and welcoming locals—provides cultural authenticity often lost in over-commercialized coastal destinations.
lifestyleSection: Living in Algorfa means embracing a balanced Mediterranean lifestyle that prioritizes quality over quantity. The international golf community has established itself here, creating a cosmopolitan yet intimate social fabric where English is widely spoken within the resort community. Daily life revolves around outdoor activities: morning rounds at La Finca Golf, afternoon markets for fresh produce in the village centre, and evening aperitifs at local restaurants serving authentic paella and seafood specialties. The expat community is well-established and welcoming, offering bridge clubs, dining societies, and golf tournaments throughout the year. Beaches at Guardamar and La Mata provide weekend coastal escapes (15-20 minutes), while Torrevieja's comprehensive shopping and entertainment venues cater to more sophisticated cultural pursuits. The village maintains an unhurried pace that encourages genuine relationships and community engagement—the antithesis of anonymous coastal developments. For those accustomed to discerning living, Algorfa offers the rare combination of accessibility to amenities with preservation of personal privacy and authentic community.
investmentSection: This villa represents a compelling investment thesis for international buyers. The Algorfa property market has appreciated 12% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader Costa Blanca trends, driven by the area's appeal to golf enthusiasts and quality-focused expatriates. Unlike speculative coastal markets, Algorfa's steady appreciation reflects genuine demand from established residents. The €779,000 acquisition price generates immediate rental potential—comparable properties within La Finca Golf command approximately €900 per week (€46,800 annually), providing a meaningful yield while maintaining owner use during preferred months. The property's 50% valuation advantage versus crowded coastal towns creates arbitrage opportunity; investors purchasing now benefit from substantial equity appreciation as the area matures. The established expat community ensures reliable tenant pools, while the golf estate amenities provide long-term value preservation. Whether pursued as a personal residence with occasional rental income or a strategic portfolio addition, this villa combines lifestyle accessibility with economic rationale.
conclusion:
This exceptional villa at Reference N9364 represents a rare convergence of sophisticated lifestyle, investment merit, and genuine value. For discerning buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean living without coastal price premiums, this La Finca Golf property delivers precisely calibrated appeal: world-class golfing community, established international networks, modern construction standards, and robust appreciation potential. healthcare.text: Healthcare accessibility ranks as a primary consideration for discerning international residents, and Algorfa delivers comprehensive medical services. Hospital de Torrevieja, Spain's largest private hospital, operates just 20 minutes away, providing world-class diagnostic and surgical facilities with English-speaking staff experienced in international patient care. The local health centre in Algorfa village offers general practitioners and minor emergency services, with several medical professionals fluent in English. The Spanish healthcare system ranks among Europe's finest, combining public accessibility with excellent private options for those preferring premium services. International insurance providers maintain established relationships with local physicians, streamlining coverage and reimbursement processes. Emergency services response times meet European standards, and medical tourism infrastructure supports continuity with international healthcare providers.
